title: New Thunderbird
content: Hello - I upgraded to the BETA version today. Its good, but none of my email addresses migrated to the NEW Version. How can I get them across ? Thanks, Robert
creator: robert.pugh

title: Email to a single .outlook.com addressee is "sent" but does not arrive. Works perfectly when using MS Outlook
content:
Using Thunderbird 102.12.0 (64-bit) on Win10 PC. 3 accounts, all IMAP and Gmail Works perfectly except.... When sending to a specific @outllok.com address: It appears to be sent and is in "sent" folder. However, contact does not receive it. 3 other contacts with @outlook.com addresses all receive emails from me. Have tried: 1) Sending from a different account - same issue 2) Deleting and re adding address - same issue 3) Deleting and re-adding account - same issue 4) Checking filters both ends - nothing blocked 5) Sending via outlook - works, no problem.

I don't want to go back to using MS Outlook. Is there a solution?
creator: homecassey

title: TB login on one Gmail account not working
content:
I have four Gmail accounts and three are working on TB on my Windows 10 desktop. On the fourth account (genealogyjoe@gmail.com), when I try to download messages from Gmail I get an error box that says "Authentication failure while connecting to imap.google.com". Meanwhile I am able to access the account using either Firefox or the Gmail app on the same desktop or on my Android phone.

Using the help pages I have:

  • set login authentication to Oauth
  • verified that javascript is enabled
  • verified that there is an Oauth token for the account and it is dated 6/14/2023, about the time that i first noticed the problem
  • removed imap and smtp logins for the account
  • restarted TB

But the problem continues.

Any suggestions?
creator: genealogyjoe

title: Google Pop Up 'One Account All of Google' in Thunderbird
content:
Hello, How do I stop this Pop UP when Thunderbird starts? As far as I can tell cookies are enabled and the authentication is OAuth2 for incoming and outgoing email.

Thank you [email removed from public forum]
creator: ctg_00

title: Thunderbird freezes while composing message
content: TB 102.12.0(64 bit) on Win 11 freezes randomly when composing a message. When it freezes the only way to free my system is to go to Task Manager and end the task. I tried reinstalling TB but the problem still persists. The problem appears to be related to the latest update.
creator: sailfree1

title: Lost my mails
content: The other day some strange things happened with my pc - cannot remember the details but it was something with restart. It resulted in amongother thing that I lost all my mails. Could they be somewhere on my pc and how do I retrieve them?
creator: graverholt
